query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.symbol) as total_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks WHERE lastSyncAt IS NOT NULL) as synced_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStockPrices) as total_price_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM usStockPrices) as stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usDataSyncStatus) as sync_status_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usDataSyncErrors) as error_records,
  (SELECT MAX(lastSyncAt) FROM usStocks) as latest_sync_time
FROM usStocks s
